title: Screw London, saving Paris instead | Nightmare Creatures 2 First playthrough

fragments.text: tfw left earbuds in pants I gave to my mom for laundry so wont be able to listen when I go out for walk

police get involved for rare pokemon captures
now to weird people out even more: I didn't have a phone in 2016
i think it was 09 or 10 for me
i wouldn't expect someone who got a smartphone in 21 to play pokemon go in 25 lol
010 is something your arch nemesis shadow dog would say

"these speedrunners are so quick! he beat the game in 4 hours!" but no one talks about the time it took to get it
That's why my stream watching has become basically former speedrunners doing lets plays
the only speedrunner i can watch for more than a couple minutes anymore is flajj doing vc runs
Watching former speedrunners is just a good way to find streams that don't have a billion alerts and hyperactive personalities

in london it's shivs, in paris it's chainsaws

just jump over the fence bro

as if don‚Äôt find out where meant to be soon I quit forever

josh is my go-to example for you can tell the enjoyment has waned from doing it for a living
Well I hope they don‚Äôt get you to do jobs above your pay grade
But then don‚Äôt be a pushover either
tfw I haven't monetized my skills
Still enjoy programming, but I basically make "pointless" websites for companies.
The technology apart is what gets me though
Yeah it is also a different aspect now I have to feed 3 kids and a waifu.
Programming and web design etc was my cazin‚Äôs hobby and he now owns his own company
Time for that Instant Noodle Diet
I would love to have my own company honestly, but I also want to spend time with the family.
I mean I'm honestly not far off that
So just doing "a job" is better for me in that regards.
Can do all the hobbies and things I always want once the work is done.
have my meals worked out to cost per meal
It becomes your full time investment.
Friend of mine did that, and now he is just nonstop working, he loves it but he also has no partner nor relationship nor wish for kids.
He has a wife and 4 kids, two dogs and two cats
I think he‚Äôs out of that stage where you‚Äôre more full on with your involvement
Just partying, working and building up the company.
@Dubgame Damn, sounds like the road I'm taking
Right? You can do it, Heinki!
@Dubgame Not more kids though, don't give Aleshya ideas!
I just need a job that gives me the means to uproot and transplant in another country if need be
One more to make it an even number hahaha
Do you have all girls, Heinki?
I told her that this is the last try, and it is another girl so I was like "Yeah I'm done trying"
I have a cousin with 7 sons and 0 daughters iirc
Gotta stay fit for the next 20years to beat up the boyfriend, just in case
Or teach your girls to do that lol
Yeah they are all healthy and that is good. But yeah luckily we are in germany.
Both my sister have boyfriends now, so it is always funny when they come over and look at us.
One is a fitness guy and the other is actually a fighter in our club so we allowed him to be together basically
Either you fight or you die, runs in the blood.
Best was once that fitness Boyfriend wanted to do the training with me and my brother, so we said sure,.
We made the training already easier, but he went and threw up. Sister came and asked what we did we just laughed at him and her.
It was hillarious, it was also training after training
Does he just do weightlifting or what?
Weightlifting and some own weight training
And I‚Äôm guessing you were doing a more cardio focus exercise?
He can do more pull-ups than me, I give him that. But the stamina and explosive excersises were which killed him.
My friend does weight training and she looks super good but my god, her cardio is disgraceful
Yeah we did some explosive pushups combined with squat jumps and also planks with kicking each others stomache and such
Yeah I mean if you focus on heavy weights your cardio will suffer basically.
Best buddy is a body builder, he does 140kg bench presses as a fucking 70kg guy.
But if he runs one round with me, he is out of breath.
Never enjoyed weight lifting, but need it for the training, especially for my joints/ankles.
Yep exactly. Most is still technique.
But if your neck is weak and you get a punch off then it is also over.
My right knee is fucked from weight training
Now need to focus on knee excersises which are getting the strength back.
Yeah exactly, people always think "I don't need equipment" and then they injury themselve
As your feet are smacking on a hard ground haha
I walked for what ended up being like 5 hours in london without much pain at all
guess my shoes and insole setup is p good right now

nah omega had cleared em out
